data.actual_result: the name and icon appear white as if loading from lazy guild and never show name and icon until status is changed again
data.expected_result: name and icon will load as normal
data.short_description: name won't load in online list after changing from invisible to DnD
data.steps_to_repro: - change status to offline - look at online list in server - change status to do not disturb - check online list on server
